svg.text: Reinforcement Learning Methods for Language Models
Different approaches to align LLMs with human preferences (NOT game AI!)

g.text: • Humans rank model outputs A vs B
• Use same preference data as RLHF
• Directly optimize policy with classification loss
• Replace human feedback with AI feedback
• Use strong AI model to rate outputs
• Same RLHF process but with AI labels

svg.text: Key Insight: These are NOT traditional RL methods - they're specialized for language model alignment
RL for LLMs vs Traditional RL

text.tspan: raditional RL: Discrete actions, game environments, reward from environment

svg.text: LLM RL: Token-level policies, text generation, human preference rewards, alignment focus
